page.title: 13 CLUBS
page.content: The village of Gt. Staughton is rich in its Club activities. All residents are automatically members of the Community Association which organises many social, cultural and sporting events. There is a thriving Drama Club - Staughton Stagers - and a Youth Club for our young people of 10+. For the adults we have a Social Club, Women's Institute, Mothers' Union, British Legion, an Over 60's Club and a Horticultural Society. The village school is host to the Brownie Pack and the Guide Company. Playgroup and Play & Chat Club ensure that our Under 5's are not forgotten. We have a Tennis Club with its own new court on the Playing Field; Football, Cricket, Badminton and Table Tennis Clubs also meet in the appropriate seasons.
